metadata.title: CVE-2021-3585 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in openstack-tripleo-heat-templates. Plain passwords fromRHSM exist in the logs during OSP13 deployment with subscription-manager.

criterions.comment: tripleo-heat-templates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
